title: Founders Grotesk – similar typefaces?
content:
Hello

I'm looking into using Founders Grotesk for a project and I'm looking for other options before making my mind up… does anyone have any ideas for similar typefaces that have weights that have a similar style, work at text sizes but also have more condensed headline weights?

Any suggestions welcome!

Thanks
author: stephen_k

comments.content:
Slight edit:

"does anyone have any ideas for similar typefaces that have a similar style and have weights that work at text sizes but also have more condensed headline weights?"
